{{MessageWelcome}}

  • {{"Doctor" + element.id}}
      Name
    • {{element.name}}
      Cedula
    • {{element.cedula}}
    • import { getLocaleDateFormat } from '@angular/common'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { WelcomePageServiceService } from 'src/app/services/General/General-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-directory-doctor', templateUrl: './directory-doctor.component.html', styleUrls: ['./directory-doctor.component.css'] }) export class DirectoryDoctorComponent implements OnInit { public MessageWelcome : any; public infoDataAll : any; public UrlAll : String = "Doctor/all" constructor(private WelcomeService : WelcomePageServiceService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.WelcomeService.getHome("doctors").subscribe( { next: (value) => {this.MessageWelcome = value}, error:(error) =>{window.alert(error.message)} } ) } getData() : void{ this.WelcomeService.getDataAll(this.UrlAll).subscribe( { next: (value) => {this.infoDataAll = value console.log(value)}, error:(error) =>{window.alert(error.message)} } ) } }
